00026 #include "config_dap.h"
00027 
00028 #include "AISConnect.h"
00029 
00038 AISConnect::AISConnect(const string &name) throw(AISDatabaseReadFailed)
00039     : Connect(name), d_ais_merge(0)
00040 {
00041     const string &ais_db = RCReader::instance()->get_ais_database();
00042     if (ais_db != "")
00043     d_ais_merge = new AISMerge(ais_db);
00044 }
00045 
00055 AISConnect::AISConnect(const string &name, const string &ais) 
00056     throw(AISDatabaseReadFailed)
00057     : Connect(name), d_ais_merge(0)
00058 {
00059     d_ais_merge = new AISMerge(ais);
00060 }
00061 
00063 AISConnect::~AISConnect()
00064 {
00065     delete d_ais_merge;
00066 }
00067 
00076 void
00077 AISConnect::request_das(DAS &das) throw(Error, InternalErr)
00078 {
00079     Connect::request_das(das);
00080 
00081     if (d_ais_merge)
00082     d_ais_merge->merge(URL(false), das); // URL(false) --> URL w/o CE
00083 }

00089 // Revision 1.3  2003/03/12 01:07:34  jimg
00090 // Added regular expressions to the AIS subsystem. In an AIS database (XML)
00091 // it is now possible to list a regular expression in place of an explicit
00092 // URL. The AIS will try to match this Regexp against candidate URLs and
00093 // return the ancillary resources for all those that succeed.
